note: Example: Low quality experiment/Indexes are swapped ...

assay.__prompt__: What kind of NGS was used in your experiment?
assay.RIME: Rapid immunoprecipitation mass spectrometry of endogenous proteins

__prompts__.technology: What technology was used? [Example: 10X Genomics if you used SCR]
__prompts__.date: Date of sequencing, should be the same as defined by Genomics Platform in YYYYMMDD format!
__prompts__.codename: Your name initials [Example: JB for Josh Brickman]
__prompts__.sequencer: What sequencing machine was used? [Example: NovaSeq 2000/NextSeq 2000/NextSeq 500]
__prompts__.seq_kit: What sequencing kit did you use? Please provide product number if available
__prompts__.n_samples: How many samples have been sequenced?
__prompts__.organism_version: Which version of genome was used [Example: mm10, hg38]
__prompts__.origin: Is this internal experiment of external (collaborator/publication)?
__prompts__.genomics_path: Full path to Genomics folder of the experiment
__prompts__.short_desc: Provide a short summary of the experiment
__prompts__.long_desc: Provide a longer description of the experiment
__prompts__.note: Optional: Was there something worth knowing?
